title: Can't login to LoL?!?!
body: Hey guys, cant sign into OCE client, wondering if anyone could by-pass this somehow or do we just have to wait it out?

replies.body:
why arent the servers working?
i need help plz tried everything
This is dragging on its been down for hours now

Yeah, it looks like there are server issues currently on OCE.  Some players are failing to login, and ranked's been disabled while a resolution is worked on.  Bookmark our [status page ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)to stay updated, and hang on until this is fixed!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BXZUovwF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-07T22:29:39.152+0000)
>
> Yeah, it looks like there are server issues currently on OCE.  Some players are failing to login, and ranked's been disabled while a resolution is worked on.  Bookmark our [status page ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)to stay updated, and hang on until this is fixed!

I mean, it'd be nice if you could give us a time -_-
